title: SIJ Acroni - Greenwashing Jeklarne
reality: EAF tehnologija že od 1960-ih - ni nova
description: Analiza razkoraka med javnimi obljubami SIJ Group in dejanskimi podatki o emisijah. €230M EU financiranja za 'dekarbonizacijo' že obstoječe tehnologije.

title: Lafarge Cement - Zaprt po 13-letnem boju
reality: Zaprt 2015 po pritisku skupnosti - primer uspeha aktivizma
description: Študija primera kako lokalna skupnost lahko ustavi onesnaževalca kljub lobijem. 13-letni boj od 2002 do 2015.

title: Ljubljana - Zelena prestolnica?
reality: Najvišja koncentracija nitratov na Savi - 1.64 mg/L (limit 0.5)
description: Razkorak med zeleno podobo Ljubljane in dejanskimi podatki o kakovosti vode. Primerjava PR kampanj z znanstvenimi meritvami.

title: Holcim Emissions Crisis

title: Holcim Emissions
description:
Eye of Horus
A stone carving of the Eye of Horus in an ancient Egyptian temple. The Eye of Horus (also known as the Wedjat
or Udjat) is an iconic symbol from ancient Egypt, representing protection, well-being, and restoration 1 .
According to myth, the sky god Horus lost his left eye in a battle against his uncle, the god Set, but the eye
was magically restored by the goddess Hathor (or the god Thoth), making it a symbol of healing and
wholeness 2 . Ancient Egyptians revered the Eye of Horus as a powerful protective amulet, using it to ward
off evil and to ensure the health and safety of the wearer 2 .
author: Projekt Orion
actions: Oddaj ZDIJZ zahtevo za Holcim Emissions.
Kontaktiraj lokalne medije v lokalno okolje.
Deli raziskavo #holcim-emissions na družbenih omrežjih.

title: The Lavender Gospel - AI & Automated Violence
promise: Precision warfare will minimize civilian casualties through AI targeting systems
reality: 37,000 targets, 10% error rate, 20-second reviews, 100+ acceptable civilian deaths per target
description: Sacred testimony documenting the transformation of AI from potential liberation tool into automated killing machine. Integrates three books: Shadow Covenant (the networks), Distributed Awakening (the alternative), and Anatomy of Murder (Lavender/Gospel AI systems).
sources: Local Call Reporting: Gospel Targeting System
